channel.title: CVE Feed for WP Codeus -- Advanced Sermons
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP Codeus -- Advanced Sermons

item.title: CVE-2024-29928|2024-03-27T07:29:47.590Z -- WP Codeus -- Advanced Sermons
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WP Codeus Advanced Sermons allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Advanced Sermons: from n/a through 3.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-27952|2024-03-13T16:18:11.351Z -- WP Codeus -- Advanced Sermons
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WP Codeus Advanced Sermons allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Advanced Sermons: from n/a through 3.2.
